PHRASE.LANG: The short chaps offer a little less protection to your legs, but they are lighter so you can move around better. If you're just doing work around the barn it might be a better idea to put these on instead of the full length chaps. [#Legal]

Les jambières courtes offrent un peu moins de protection à vos jambes, mais elles sont plus légères pour mieux vous déplacer. Si vous travaillez juste autour de la grange, utilisez-les au lieu de prendre celles qui sont plus longues. [#Legal]

Die kurzen Chaps bieten eine etwas weniger Schutz für die Beine, aber sie sind leichter, so dass man sich besser bewegen kann. Wenn du nur Arbeiten rund um die Scheune erledigst, könnte es schlauer sein, diese statt der langen Chaps zu tragen. [#Legal]

I piccoli gambali offrono una piccola protezione alle tue gambe, ma sono anche leggeri, così potrai muoverti meglio. Se si sta facendo un lavoro intorno alla stalla potrebbe essere una migliore idea di mettere su questi, invece dei grandi gambali. [#Legal]

Las chaparreras cortas ofrecen un poco menos de protección a tus piernas, pero son menos pesadas así que te puedes mover un poco mejor. Si estas haciendo algún trabajo por el granero, podría ser mejor idea llevar éstas en lugar de las chaparreras largas. [#Legal]

The short chaps offer a little less protection to your legs, but they are lighter so you can move around better. If you're just doing work around the barn it might be a better idea to put these on instead of the full length chaps. [#Legal]

The short chaps offer a little less protection to your legs, but they are lighter so you can move around better. If you're just doing work around the barn it might be a better idea to put these on instead of the full length chaps. [#Legal]

The short chaps offer a little less protection to your legs, but they are lighter so you can move around better. If you're just doing work around the barn it might be a better idea to put these on instead of the full length chaps. [#Legal]
